subject: Ordering Ttsynth with internet explorer
body:
Hi guys,
Has anyone had trouble ordering Ttsynth with ie? I just placed my order and
could not down the rpm or Debian packages I selected.
The order placed fine and I received my serial number but the package
download links did not work for me.
Anyone else experienced this?

Tom

No virus found in this outgoing message.
Checked by AVG Free Edition. 
Version: 7.5.472 / Virus Database: 269.8.11/837 - Release Date: 6/6/2007
2:03 PM
